data.title: Belgian Jews Shocked by Justice Minister's Call to 'Forget' Nazi Past
data.meta_description: Belgian Justice Minister Stefaan De Clerck Supports Initiative to Give Amnesty to Nazi Collaborators, Jewish Magazine Joods Actueel Reports.
